column1: Received this product for complimentary testing! And another L'Oréal product that did not disappoint. Nice clean scent with a non greasy feel and lightweight, but definitely felt hydrated. Especially me being a combination skin I don't use a lot of creams more lotions. But I would do this nightly for sure [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have wanted to try the Rosy Tone line since I first saw it advertised and thanks to Influenster, I received the moisturizer complimentary to test. It is amazing! The scent is subtle and the way it makes my face feel will keep me purchasing this product. L'Oreal is a premium brand in my opinion! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complementary for testing purposes and can honesty say I'd buy this again. Love the consistency of the cream and the nice scent. It gives a subtle pink glow to your skin so you can get away without wearing makeup. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this moisturizer! It flat out works! My face is rosy! Its helped tremendously with the dryness and uneven skin tone. It comes beautifully packaged in a rose gold box. The moisturizer itself is thick and creamy and a gorgeous shade of pink. It applies easily and sinks into my skin making it feel soft and smooth. Seriously good stuff! Thank you to Influenster and LOreal Paris for sending this free for my honest review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this Rosy Tone moisturizer by L'Oréal complimentary for testing and review purposes from Influenster. When I first opened the jar I noticed the smell which is lovely, light and not over powering. The product seemed thick but it goes on effortlessly using very little product. It absorbs nicely and is not greasy. This moisturizer has helped to revive my skin and give me a healthy glow. I look like I spent time outside, healthy and glowing. Thanks L'Oréal! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary from Influenster to try. I love the feel of the rose-tone face moisturizer. Goes on smooth and does not feel greasy I can easily apply my foundation right after and my face fell smooth and radiant throughout the day. I would definitely buy this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This has quickly become a part of my morning skincare routine. After several weeks of use I am seeing my full skin tone become rosy and looking more youthful. I'm so thrilled to have found this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this wonder product from Influenster completely complimentary. I have tried many face moisturizers because of my dry sky. Many products leave it feeling itching and sticky. But I was in shock when this product left my skin moist and smooth. I couldn't stop touching my face and showing off what this did for my skin. It also gave my skin with a soft pink glow. I will be buying this again. Love it!

I received this product for free from Influenster to sample and review. I like it a lot. It's really thick so a little goes a long way. It goes on pink but blends in clear. It smells nice. find it just slightly greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Rosy Tone face Moisturizer is an awesome product. The first time I used it I could see a difference in my skin, my skin felt very smooth and my fine lines were a lot smoother. I thank L'oreal and voxbox for sending this product to me for free to try out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this L'Oreal product as a voxbox from influenster to test. I like how this moisturizer has a tent to it it makes your skin color look more consistent and even. The only thing I do not care for is that because it's an exfoliant it tends to follow up into little pills. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Rosy Tone Moisturizer is working very well for my combination skin. I enjoy the added moisture since the winter chill has wrecked havoc on my face. Am very happy it's not too moisturize and adding to my daily routine is simple. I just dab on a little and even use on my neck. After two weeks my skin feels soft and has a pretty flush. I was worried with my rich chocolate complexion it might look ashy but it soaks in and leaves me looking well rested not shiny. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Loeal Paris Age Perfect Rosy Tone Fragrance Free Face Moisturizer is just what I was looking for. It is non-greasy. My skin looks renewed. It has given me a smooth healthy glow. I received a complimentry sample from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as part of a voxbox from Influenster. The packaging again, is beautifully luxurious feeling. The product itself is a little pinker than I expected. Applied first thing in the morning, pre makeup, it is very softening. I don't notice any scent, but I do feel my skin is much softer and rosier with this product. I have also used it sans makeup and my natural complexion is enhanced with the rosy tint. Definitely on my list for just the moisturizing aspect. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love how L'Oreal Age Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer makes your skin feeling healthy again . Goes on smooth , not greasy . If you have dull looking skin this is the product you need to help restore your skin back to health leaving your skin feeling vibrant again . [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received the L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer complimentary from Influenster in return for my honest review! Being 53 years old my skin does appear to be aging! Darn it! This product is amazing as it makes my skin look and feel younger and healthier with a rosy glow! I am in love with this for sure! I will definitely be purchasing this when I run out! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I started using this a couple weeks ago. I have vdry dry skin. It felt good going on my skin and it really left my skin plump and glowing. I noticed my skin moisturization and glow improved with each use. I really enjoy using this! I received this complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer was sent to me for free by Influenster. To be honest I doubted that I would like a rose tinted moisturizer. But I do! I don't notice that my skin is “tinted”. Just that it has a rosy glow. Very subtle. The moisturizer feels great going on, is not scented and leaves my face feeling soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This time of year my skin needs a little more moisture. I tried this and love it! The texture is a soft whipped cream that feels fabulous! It made my skin soft, hydrated, and smoother. The cream absorbs immediately and doesn't leave any tacky feeling. It's like your skin, only better! I did recieved this complimentary. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a complimentary jar of Age Perfect Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer at just the right time! My face had several dry areas from the cold weather. After applying, my skin felt revived and soft. I love this moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this moisturizer. It's very light and smooth going on and not at all too thick, which is really nice. My skin absorbs the cream easily and wasn't the slightest bit greasy. It has a really nice rosy color to it. And my skin us definitely hydrated.
I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product was provided to me as a courtesy for testing purposes. I really like the glow. It has a light fragrance and is non-irritating. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was sent this product for free from Influenster to use and review. My skin is definitely more hydrated. Look forward to seeing it after a months use. I would purchase this again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Influenster sent me this product free to try and review. I'm so glad they did. This cream makes my face so soft and gives it a glow. I will be purchasing more when I run out. Amazing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I enjoy the soft creamy texture of the product. It Goes on light and doesn't cause my skin to be oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I was given this product from Influenster for a review. I thought it was a great product. It wasn't greasy and it made my skin so smooth! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is my new obsession. It feels like mousse, and the hint of rose tone makes my skin look so even and glowing! Got a free sample to try and will be buying more when I run out! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a complimentary product. I love the feel of this product on my skin, I have very dry skin and this worked better than a lot of other products I have tried. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from my Influenster box and it was the best product so far. My face feels like silk after applying. I loved it so much that I went to local grocery store and bought one. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I received this product complimentary from #influenster i tried this two days so far and i am now going to use this product always. Not greasy and my skin feels great

Through influent i send the company Loreal age perfect cell renewal rosy tone moisturizer and be surprised by its delicate smell the softeness and leaves a glistening touch on skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It has a nice scent, a little thick, slightly greasy (caution if you have oily skin) but absorbs quickly. My skin feels moisturized and works very well under my makeup. I enjoy it best at night after cleansing my face when I feel dry the most. I don't know about the claim of “restoring the skin's rosy tone” since I am a person of color, other than that I like it. l received this product complimentary for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I just purchased my second container because the results from the first one were just awesome! My skin looks smoother, it feels smoother and softer. Use it twice daily and with a serum at night, it really doesn't take much as it is very rich. I've paid much much more for moisturizers that didn't deliver the results I've seen in my skin!

I have been a walmart customer since 1996. Ever since I started shopping online, which is much later, I find most of walmart's products good. However, of late, it seems to me that whenever I order cosmetics, I am sorely disappointed by the quality as they seem like rejects. The L'Oreal Rosy Tone Day Cream packaging was squished and the cap was broken. The bottle itself looks old. I will return it to a store. I have found another online store which expedites things to me in brand new condition.

love this product. hate the glass jar. I accidentally dropped it on my tile bathroom. floor and it shattered glass e everywhere. the product now is full of glass and I cant use it! wish u could consider a different package instead of glass. accidents happen but pls dont use glass containers. 3 stars be cause I paid good money for this product and it broke before I could use it.

This is a rich moisturizer that has a rosy tone, but it doesn't really leave a strong color. It makes your skin look refreshed, nicely moisturized, and ready to apply makeup. I like the way it feels on my skin. I received this moisturizer free from influenster in a recent voxbox for testing purposes. This opinion is my own. #influenster #voxbox #lorealparis [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this moisturizer! I've been using it every morning for a month. It is a thick moisturizer but absorbs quickly and leaves your skin looking healthy, beautiful and very soft. I wear it under makeup and it plays well with whatever I put on top of it. I received this product complimentary for review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought this would be a good moisturizer for my mature skin with the added benefit of a little pink tone. I don't really like to wear foundation every day. But the product contains mica. So there are minute little sparkles in it. Putting sparkles on my face is not my idea of "visibly youthful, healthy tone" for my "mature, dull skin." So I'm disappointed and will be returning it. It would be great without the sparkes.

L'Oreal Paris Age Perfect Rosy Tone moisturizer is a REALLY GREAT product! I'm is my upper eighties and it seemed as though my skin was becoming more difficult to look healthy, no matter what moisturizer I used. L'Oreal's rosy tone did the trick, my skin looks healthier and smoother. Its even good for my morale! Barbara

Using 2 other Loreal (collagen/anti-aging) moisturizers and bought this to try the rosy tone feature. Like the creamy, non- greasy, non-oily feel of it. Glides on. Skin bounce is good even by afternoon, product lasts on my skin most of the day. Good for a $20 cream. Impressed with Loreal and ask them to continue to have "fragrance free" products. .

Pleasantly surprised. It goes on soft and smooth. No shine whatsoever, the rosy tone is wonderful, perfect for my skin tone. It has a slight rose fragrance which is wonderful. No itching, burning. Will order again.

This is the best moisturizer I've used in a very long time. Not too oily but very moisturizing. My skin feels great. I got this free to try from Influenster [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this sample on Influenster and absolutely loved this moisturizer. It was a very creamy texture, which I liked. It also left my skin feeling extremely soft and silky. I would highly recommend this product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is great! I love the feel of this moisturizer. It absorbs very fast leaves your skin hydrated but not oily. I used it under my foundation as well as makeup free it worked both ways. I love the fact that a little goes a long way, I literally used a dot on my forehead, cheeks, and chin and that was enough. I received this product complimentary for review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from Influenster for free in exchange for an unbiased review. I love this product! I wasn't crazy about the mask but this is wonderful. It's not greasy, you only need a little bit, and it's not heavy. I've been using for about a month now. I haven't seen much change in my skin so can't say if it's working but the feel of it is terrific. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for about a month. I really appreciate the thick consistency and the fact that it absorbs easily. Because it doesn't contain sunscreen, I only use it on days when I'll be staying inside or wearing makeup over it. It does well under makeup. I gave 4 of 5 stars because it doesn't have sunscreen. I received this product complimentary so I could review [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using L'Oréal Age Perfect Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer for 3 weeks. The product is packaged beautifully. The smell is appealing, not overpowering. The moisturizer is a nice texture, not too thick or thin. I have not noticed a new rosy tone to my skin, but I do have a naturally darker skin tone. My skin does feel softer and has a dewy look. I received this product from Influenster in exchange for a review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this product. Makes my skin soft and supple as well as rejuvenated. Goes on smooth and does not leave a residue. Only thing is it has a rosy smell which I don't care for, but it doesn't linger so I can tolerate it. I definitely recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this moisturizer from Influenster to test and review. I've been using it for about 3 weeks with the All-over Honey Balm. I really liked the feel of the moisturizer. It is not heavy and has a very light scent. A little bit goes a long way! It leaves my skin feeling soft and seems to even out my complexion. The only thing that is missing is sunscreen. I prefer moisturizers that include sunscreen.  I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Rosy Tone Fragrance Free Face Moisturizer for 2 weeks now and I have to say that I have noticed a difference in my face, in a good way. My face feels smooth and my fine lines are less noticeable. I like that it's fragrance free so it won't clash with anything else I put on my face. I didn't notice a rosy tone though but that doesn't bother me. I would definitely buy this product and recommend it to my friends. I received this product complimentary for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using Age Perfect Rosy Tone Fragrance Free Face Moisturizer for a little over a week and I'm so very happy with it. My face is softer and smoother. It doesn't take much and it's creamy without feeling heavy, oily or sticky. It's just what I've been looking for. I'm very pleased.
Thanks so much to L'Oreal and Influenster for sending me this complimentary product and giving me the opportunity to try it for free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Every time a new product comes available, I just have to try it. I am in my early 50s and desperately looking for that miracle dream to turn back time. This product proved that my skin needed moisture. It smelled good, nothing artificial or funky. It absorbed completely leaving no residue. I didn't notice a rosy tone to my skin. The only reason I didn't give it more stars was because of the thick texture. I received this product complimentary for testing.

I am 52 and have dry dull winter skin currently. I also have very sensitive skin. This product made my skin feel smoother with a healthy pink glow. And the best part is that it did not irritate my skin.
I received this product for free for a honest review from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Better than I thought it would be. I don't normally use drug store skin care but I received this for free from Influenster for review. It had a very nice consistency and it improved the look of fine lines around my mouth and forehead. I will finish using this and consider purchasing.

I received a complimentary voxbox for testing purposes and I am so glad I did! My skin was dull and lackluster. After using this product for a week I noticed my skin was brighter and actually had its old rosy glow. A little goes a long way and it went on easily and didnt leave a heavy residue. Bravo L' Oreal!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from Influenster and was asked to review it. I'm 53 and have average skin. I honestly didn't notice any difference after using it. At first the pink color threw me off. It didn't smell awesome either. I hope it works for someone else. I did receive it complimentary so I'm happy for that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried loreal rosy tone moisturizer daily for a week and so far I am really loving how it works. Lot of moisture and the rosy undertones do really make a difference in my skin's appearance. Very pleasant product to use overall and good results. I received a free sample from Influencer to facilitate my review but the opinions expressed are solely my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentery product from influencer and i love it. My skin is usually dry and rough looking and know i feel like i have a natural rosey glow to my skin. And the price will keep me using it. Qualify skin care at an affordable price. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this from Influenster as part of my Voxbox to review and I have to say, this is one of the best products I've ever used! It absorbs quickly and it really does impart a beautiful rosey glow - I even had a coworker comment on how nice and glowy my skin has been. I don't usually use L'Oreal skin care because in the past I've found them to be too heavily fragranced, but this has a very light, fresh scent that I can handle. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for about two weeks. The texture is a bit weird—kind of like a mousse-y makeup. It feels nice going on, and I think my skin looks good and feels hydrated. It might look a little pinker. This is a daytime moisturizer, but it doesn't have sunscreen, so I probably won't use it on a long-term basis. It's also not cruelty-free. I received this complimentary product from Influenster for testing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product free for testing purposes and it is not a good fit for my skin type. I have been applying it daily for about 3 weeks. The rosy tone is a bit too much for me as it makes me look like I'm hot all day long. In addition, my skin starts to feel oily by early afternoon. It does go on smoothly and has a mild pleasant fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using the Rosy Tone Face Moisturizer for a few weeks now & I really like it. It melts into the skin and doesn't leave an oily residue. I believe it has improved the overall tone of my skin & restored a healthy glow. Will continue to use this. I received this product complimentaryfor testing. All opinions about the product are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like the way it feels going on my skin and I believe that I can see an immediate difference in the moisture level of my very dry skin. I will definitely continue using it and am glad to have been given the opportunity by Influenster's VoxBox program. I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this to saple and have been using it for 3 weeks now. It has turned my tired winter skin into a nice rosy glowing face. Its one of the few face lotions that does not leave those little pills behind on your face. I can even go without foundation and just wear the Rosy Tone moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Finally a moisturizer that dryness needs of more mature women. Makes your face noticeably softer. Non greasy, but definitely moisturized and more youthful. Received product in exchange for totally unbiased review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product free in my last Influenster box. I was worried that the rose tint would make my face red. To my surprise it left my skin feeling Smooth and silky not greasy at all. added bonus didn't make me look red at all! I would recommend this product it's a fantastic face moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This rosy moisturizer is fantastic! It goes on very smooth and does not feel heavy or greasy at all. My skin is already looking so much better and I've only used it for a couple of weeks. I love the rosy color. It is very subtle and natural looking but gives my skin such a great glow. I highly recommend this product! I received this product free from Influenster and the opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love this moisturizer! It feels nice going on, it smells lovely and it gives my skin a healthy, rosy glow! I use it every day - alone and under makeup!
*This product was provided for free for testing purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary product from Influenster to review and wow!! I can already feel and see a difference in my skin in just 1 week!! It feels light and silky on my skin. I absolutely love this!! Thank you Influenster for allowing me to try this fabulous product. I would definitely recommend this to my family and friends!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Every day I am AMAZED all over again by how great my skin looks. Smooth, soft, clear, and visibly less wrinkles. I have searched for something that actually works for years, and can honestly say my search is over. L'Oréal, you have a lifelong customer!
I received this item complimentary in exchange for an honest review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The rosy tone moisturizer is the best product I have ever use. Thanks Influenster for allowing me a chance to use Loreal moisturizer. My skin felt so smooth after just one use. I will never use another moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product complimentary to try and absolutely love it! It absorbs almost instantly and leaves my skin glowing and supple not greasy or heavy. Also great since I have very sensitive skin and I would say compares to products that easily cost quadruple what this sells for! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was at first concerned that using this during the day would make my skin oily because this is so thick and rich. It didn't, my skin feels nice and dewy, the Rosy Tone gives it a nice glow. No break outs and no sensitivity to it. A little goes a long way. I received this complimentary for a non-biased review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Although I received this product for review, I have used it in the past from my own purchase. The product really does produce a rosey hue on the cheeks! It feels silky on the skin and light on the skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the Rosy Tone Moisturizer for 2 weeks and wow! My face feels so soft and I swear it's made my skin glow. I started to see and feel the difference in my skin almost immediately. It has helped some to smooth the fine lines and added moisture to my skin. I received this as a trial free from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I recieved a complementary jar of rosy tone face moisturizer from influenster to try.
It was easy to use. It was none greasy it left my skin feeling soft and smooth and my face had a nice glow afterwards [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary via Influenster. I've been using this several weeks now and love it. It's light not greasy feeling or heavy. We've had some cold weather which can be drying on my skin and This product has worked beautifully both with the cold days as well as on those Intermittent FL humid days. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this tinted moisturizer for free from Influenster. It has a rose-colored hue that brightens my complexion. I'm 53 and my skin is somewhat dull unless I use something to brighten it up. This cream is very thick. A little goes a long way. It's very moisturizing. It blurs my imperfections a little bit. My broken capillaries are less oblivious when I use it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recieved from influenser for free to give my honest review. I love the light rosey tint that gives my face a rosey glow. No more dull looking skin. Great moisture. Skin looks smoother and moisturizer has a light scent that i love. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This L'OREAL Paris Age Perfect Cell Renewal Rosy Tone Moisturizer goes on thick and creamy. A little goes a long way. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and smooth. I like the way it feels when applying and after being applied. I received this product complimentary for review purposes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was skeptical at first on this moisturizer due to the color and being thick. But I love it. It brought color back to my face naturally and people were noticing that. It also made my skin feel awesome and incredibly soft. I received this product as a sample to try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was gifted a gorgeous full size sample thru Influenster of this. It melts into the skin beautifully and gives a slight rosy glow to my skin. I've been using it for about two weeks now and see no reason to stop! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this for free from Influenster for testing purposes. I have been using this for 2 weeks now. It is so moisturizing and leaves my skin super soft. I love the fact that is is not greasy! It does just enough to help my 52 year old skin look fresh and moisturized! I like the rosiness it gives my skin. I only need a light coat of foundation when using this! I will buy this again for sure. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a free sample from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. At first I didn't care for the pink glow when it went on, since I have golden under tones. It absorbed fast and the pink color disappeared. It feels nice when you use it. It's great following through mask. It doesn't feel heavy or greasy on my face. It's a nice product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product from Influenster for testing and review purposes. The Rosy Tone face moisturizer goes on light and doesn't leave my face feeling heavy. I was concerned about using it due to the color in the jar, but I was left with a little glow and a moisturized face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this as a complimentary sample to try. I am glad I did. I love the way it felt on my fingers and how well it went on my face. The smell was just heavenly. It taken a few days in order for me to comment. I love the way my skin is feeling after using this moisturizer. I didn't even break out form it either. I would recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this Loreal Rosy Tone Fragrance Free Moisturizer free in exchange for my honest opinion. I've been using for going on 2 weeks and love the way this goes on and makes my skin feel. Non greasy and fast absorbing moisturizer and the rosy tone is a plus!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample of this to review and I absolutely love it. At first, I was concerned at the color but once I applied it to my face, my skin absorbs it immediately and it left no color or oily residue whatsoever. Don't hesitate to buy this [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received a sample of Age Perfect Rosy Tone Fragrance Free Face Moisturizer and I agreed to give my opinion of my experience. I enjoy using it. Everything about using it was a pleasure. The packaging is pretty a the product itself is a pink shade but the prettiest part is the lovely glow my skin has and it feels and looks soft and beautiful. Using this is part of my routine I look forward to doing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Using rosy tone moisturizer was an easy exercise. The cream was somewhat thick but went on smooth a fairly lightweight. My skin felt smooth and had a "rosy" hue after using. I was a little disappointed that it seemed to wear off as time went on, but it felt very good right after applying. I recieved a complimentary full size sample of L'Oreal rosy tone moisturizer from Influenster. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this sample for an honest review and that is what you'll get. The scent was slight ,not strong at all, but the moisturizer was amazing. I put it on every single night and it was icredible feeling, soft, and supple. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this complimentary from Influenster and am so very happy that I did. The formula was a bit thicker than I was expecting, however that is not a bad thing as a little goes a long way. I absolutely love the rosy glow that comes from this product. I actually shows a healthy glow from under my foundation! I love it and would highly recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I normally do not use drug store brand cosmetics BUT since I received this item complimentary, I tried it. I really did love it. You don't need to use much and it gives your complexion a beautiful glow. It is not
Greasy at all. I will definitely continue to use this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Dull skin disappeared after only a few days and the rosy pigments of the light, non-greasy moisturizer gave me an instant glow. It did take a few minutes to seep into my skin, so I had to wait to put on my makeup. Overall - Love this product! Thank you, #Instagram, for sending me this awesome product to try for free! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this moisturizer from Infuenster in exchange for an honest review. I've been using Age Perfect Rosy Tone Moisturizer for a few weeks and love the way my skin feels. I don't notice much of a rosy tone though, but my skin is noticeably brighter and softer. I would definitely purchase this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the feel of this but it is quite thick going on my face. It isn't greasy but it does seem to moisturize my face quite well.
